forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock glimmers faintly past midnight in Downtown San Francisco, tonight unfolds under a canvas of partly cloudy skies, carrying with it the cool embrace of an evening low around 53 degrees. The west-southwest winds dance lightly, stirring the air with a gentle breath, hinting at breezy gusts promising a touch of excitement rather than chill. 

Looking ahead to Thursday, the sun is set to emerge with a warm smile, promising mostly sunny skies and highs reaching near 66 degrees. However, as the day progresses, temperatures will softly ease into a more tempered 64, perhaps inviting the wear of light layers. The winds will continue their playful sway, offering refreshing flair throughout the day. With this delightful balance of warmth and coolness, one might wander through the local farmers' market, relishing the succulent fruits of the season or perhaps seek a quiet moment at a nearby café, absorbing the city's gentle rhythm. As the day carries on, a leisurely stroll along the waterfront could prove particularly rewarding, with a possibility of encounter with the iconic marine layer just off the coast, gently cloaking the horizon in its mysterious allure.
